column5: Thanks to the Mods for a great job, creating this wonderful place and keeping it on the straight and level.  Met a lot of great folks here over the years, and, well, I'm getting a little verklempt now.
Wow, three years already, good job guys...
Happy birthday!!    For all those involved in keeping the board as great as it is, give yourselves a pat on the back as you definitely deserve it!!
Fantastic.  You guys are doing an amazing job.  Thanks for providing such a great resource and and community!

I'm still waiting for the archive page to load...tryin' to think if I was on the board back in '99...went in and out of having home internet access...had to re-start a few times.  I remember AndyK's pictorial posts of his many solo expeditions, and Canadave.  Where are they now?!?!?!     Happy birthday, OFC, and a HUGE thanks to the mods for putting up with us

Happy anniversary!  Wow 3 years since the big upgrade...hopefully with the new tools we'll see the site come alive with even more pictures and fishing related goodness.  Good or bad we can all be glad that OFC is here to stay  Good job everyone who keeps the site alive and moderated  Tony
This board is getting old and crotchety like some of the members lol  Congrats!
heh .. remember ????.. I was on ISCA and BRINTA in the mid nineties .... even before Netscape
I don't feel three years older.  Hats off to all the mods for three strong years and many yet to come.
I'm glad to have found this place
LOL.. Aint dat da trute!!

We kinda passed the day (it was the 15th) that we opened the flood gates to the new site and software. We did a major upgrade not long after and here we are. Another major upgrade will be coming in the late winter or early spring. Personally I was delighted with everyones' transition to the new hi-tech format and how quick the members caught on to the new gadgets, and I hope you like all the new toys that will come as we bring the site up to date. Amazing that only 3 years and our software is out of date. A big thanks from me from a technical standpoint. We still struggle keeping out the spam bots but the rest of the mods are on the pretty quick. The next version is supposed to be bot proof and have new toys to play with including being able to import your Flicker or Photobucket images directly, accessing the site through your facebook, a bigger profile page and much more.   Happy Anniversary guys
HAPPY BIRTHDAY!!!!
Happy Birthday and still going strong
Ill drink to that!!!!!!  cheers
Ok me too.LOL  It,s all about the members.  Wheres the cake?  Hell,even the boss could blow out three candles.
I dunno...there's something about our demographics that keeps that bedwetting ad alive on the site..lol.
Good job guys.The third or fourth generation already?
Happy birthday OFC! Great place to hang your fishing hat.
Wow! Happy Birthday, and many more to come! ....how many is 3 in internet years?
Probably 4th gen for us Joe, maybe 5th for Chris K. and a few others though.
must be time to listen to this again
Suck up.
you're just mad because I thought of it first  LOL
Happy 3rd Anniversary to the greatest site on the planet  OFC!!!  Looking forward to the O/S upgrade!!! Leechman
I think this is the 3rd generation of OFC for me. When did TJ put up the first board? I still remember when the old UofT thread board was popular as well. Does anyone else remember?
Happy birthday keep up the good work and fun everyone!
Am I a 1st or second gen?????,,,,,,,, Uoft? It,s been so long, and so many beers ago.

I remember TJ saying "If I could get a hundred members posting, we'll be fine". Hell! I've banned at least three hundred members  .....I must be the biggest pain in his azz! Really great that we're doing so well. Everyone in this community and I DO mean everyone, does their part to keep this place happening. Good stuff for sure.  And, for the record, it's gotta be 6 incarnations. Again for the record, the very first person I spoke to here was Muskystudd NKA ChrisK.
The UofT board was called the Zoo.  edit:   Holy crap! My next post will be 12,000   arrrrrrrrghhhhhhhhh   I need a life!
Happy Birthday!

Here is the 1999 incarnation..the very first http://web.archive.org/web/20000824042524/...ing.net/discus/  Apparenlty is was called a 'discus' board...looked like a frizbee, I guess.  The second version http://web.archive.org/web/20020402153808/...geboard/view.pl

Happy B-day  I do remember the 2nd version...I've been around long enough for that I don't know for sure but I'm pretty sure I've been hangin around since about November 2001. Bought a new computer, and got on the net with rogers in my new house, so the time line fits....  Geeze time flys? Might have to make it to one of the G2G's some day to put some faces to the handles LOL!
happy birthday from a noob!
Some good reading there Rick, infact I actually remember a couple of those posts from back in the day.  It'd be nice to hear from some of those long gone members again.
Its been great from its very conception to the transition to ONFC  I enjoy the reports from the many anglers who share them Its what I look forward to reading
